entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sioux Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -11.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
